sub_title: Data  Driven Digital Marketing Director *Brand Builder *Marketing Strategist *Digital Innovation *Drive Business By Innovation
summary:
❉Dennis C. Kabbedijk RDM CBMP❉

Enthusiastic and energetic Online Marketing manager with over 20 years of experience in digital media from webdesign & programming to strategical digital marketing and E-commerce strategy for both Business to Business and Business to Consumer, within small companies and multinationals. With a focus on inspiring, training and coaching employees and management to go through the digital transformation of marketing.

Managed a wide range of online channels forming strategies that combine and enhance both the offline and various online marketing activities. This in combination with my background of design and programming makes that I am comfortable in discussions with either an IT department or a marketing department to form the bridge between both worlds. Having worked with and managed multi-discipline, -language teams at various levels I am comfortable in communications with either operational or C-level teams.

❉Specialized in:❉

➊ Driving business by creating innovative opportunities, combining online and offline marketing. Forming optimized digital marketing strategies that build brands and generate business.

➋ Research and build digital marketing strategies to incorporate digital marketing within existing marketing & communication channels or remodel existing mass marketing channels to personalized and optimized online marketing channels.

➌ Training, inspiring and coaching marketing, sales and non-commercial teams to embrace digital opportunities both as a person and as an ambassador for the employer. 

❉Specialties:❉

Leading, coaching & training marketing & sales teams to embrace digital opportunities
Strategical / Tactical digital marketing plans
Creating innovative opportunities
Combining technical and marketing specifications to internet projects
CRM / Database marketing
Online B2B marketing
SEO / SEA (SEM)
Social media marketing
E-mail marketing
affiliate marketing
webdesign / usability

treasury_media.title: Eat This! Magazine Edition 6
treasury_media.description: The sixth edition of Eat This! magazine focusses on the foodservice entrepreneur. Finding new and profitable business models has become more and more relevant in foodservice over the last 2 years of corona. In this magazine you will read everything you need to know to be inspired on some of the hot trends in foodservice.

treasury_media.title: Eat This! #1 magazine
treasury_media.description: The very first ever edition of Eat This! magazine for Lamb Weston. The start of what would become a highly desired and high quality foodservice magazine distributed in the EMEA region.

treasury_media.title: Whitepaper "Van Gebrek Aan Tijd, Naar Mobiliteit"
treasury_media.description: We werken steeds meer locatieonafhankelijk en steeds vaker op wisselende tijdstippen. Deze nieuwe dynamiek vraagt om een nieuwe manier om met onze gegevens om te gaan. Inmiddels werkt 45% van de professionals in het bedrijfsleven zeker drie dagen per week niet op een vaste werkplek in een kantoor. Laat u inspireren met deze whitepaper, hoe ook uw organisatie de slag kan maken om mobiel te werken. Zodat ook u direct kunt beginnen met het besparen van o.a. reiskosten & effectieve werktijd winnen!

treasury_media.title: Customer Segmentation
treasury_media.description: Customer Segmentation, 2010 Whitepaper I wrote. "Stop your mass communications and start targeting". It was based on the research I did for a company that "wasted" alot of possible leads by throwing them away because they could not do a sale after the first cold calling contact.

treasury_media.title: Zwerfinformatie blog in OfficeMagazine
treasury_media.description: My blog about Zwerfinformatie (Security risks of information freely flowing through organizations) published in OfficeMagazine.

projects.title: Marketing Automation
projects.description: Setup of marketing automation tools in order to create more marketing effectiveness, easier workflows, personalized content. All in order to build stronger relations with our (potential) customers and in the end higher results. Started off with the correct software base, installation and procedures as it gradually grew into the implementation of A/B testing, focussed landingpages for campaigns and integration in several websites to offer advanced personalized options. This is  an ongoing process of optimization.

projects.title: Chefs.Network
projects.description: A revolutionary platform for chefs and by chefs, that want to improve their business. Offering digital tools that give insights on the results of specific menu items of the chef and tips on how to influence margin, volume, those tips are given by chefs who faced the same challenges. It also gives insights on current and upcoming trends and how they effect restaurants, made in cooperation with restaurant owners and food professionals. Launched in Italy and planned roll-out to rest of Europe.

projects.description: Helped position Aon as a prefered employer online, boost visability of job openings via online channels including social media and SEA in order to drive down costs of recruitement agencies. Traffic on the website doubled while the response rate to job openings increased 5 times.

projects.title: E-commerce platform Veenmandirect.nl
projects.description: The direct selling unit does most of her sales via phone/email, in order to make the unit more future prove and more customer focused a modern online option was needed. The assignement was to: development of a fully new optimized e-commerce platform, get the product assortment in line with the core business, write a marketing plan to make it profitable.  The setup, development and new product line was done in 6 months with the first sales within 24 hours of the launch.The overall expectation is a 1 million turnover.

projects.title: Veenman corporate website
projects.description: Full redesign of the Veenman corporate website. In order to make the website more agile, flexible to work with and to navigate we decided to build a new Veenman corporate website. The website uses a easier CMS to work with, has a more simple navigation for visitors to easly find all pages the want to see and brings forth a huge cost reduction in license costs. The corporate website is now also fully designed and optimized for use on mobile devices and has a clean design that breathes the corporate values that fit Veenman as a company. The website was build from a blank sheet to finish in 3,5 months.

contributors.headline: Data  Driven Digital Marketing Director *Brand Builder *Marketing Strategist *Digital Innovation *Drive Business By Innovation

projects.title: Veenman Blog Website
projects.description:
Introduction of monthly blogging within Veenman around the subjects printing & document management. To accommodate these blogs and to improve SEO capabilities the new Veenmanblog.nl website has been introduced. A modern, tight and easy to maintain website fully focused on SEO.

The website focuses on positioning Veenman as the Thoughtleader and subject matter expert in printing and document management. Via crosslinking with the corporate website, we create extra traffic to our products on the corporate website.

projects.title: E-mail marketing introduction
projects.description: Introduction of e-mailmarketing. E-mail marketing is used to strengthen the Veenman relationship with current customers via newsletters, to reach prospects in combined on-/offline sales campaigns and to send invitations for Veenman events. The e-mail marketing tool is a successful extention to the CRM system and works fully automated marketing campaigns.

projects.title: Mobile marketing & QR coding
projects.description: First global engine oil brand to commercially use QR codes and to introduce lubricant advise via mobile devices.Introduced Valvoline App for iOS and Android with product information and QR code scanner. At the same time as the building of the app, QR codes were introduced on a selection of Valvoline products. The QR codes linked to product pages in the app, showing "How-to" videos. In version 1.2 the Valvoline Lubricant Advisor was also added to the app, making it possible to get an oil advice anywhere from the palm of your hand.

contributors.headline: Data  Driven Digital Marketing Director *Brand Builder *Marketing Strategist *Digital Innovation *Drive Business By Innovation

projects.title: Valvoline instructional videos
projects.description: Started the development of "how-to" videos for instructional purposes, with a side purpose also to gain more exposure via social media for our lesser known products. Accumulated the videos have over 1.000.000 views and more then 32.000 minutes of content is being viewed per month. Videos are now used throughout multiple Valvoline platforms following the succes of the other instructional videos.

contributors.headline: Data  Driven Digital Marketing Director *Brand Builder *Marketing Strategist *Digital Innovation *Drive Business By Innovation

projects.title: Develop first B2C Webshop incl all involved processes
projects.description: Development of the first ever direct (retail) sales channel to consumers via a digital channel for Valvoline. The project included: writing the business case, leading the project team, marketing activation, product & pricing, transform bookkeeping to accommodate B2C sales, transform warehouse logistics to accommodate small package shipment to consumer, liason with the legal department to assure all legal aspects are in order. Web shop sells & ships directly to consumers in the United Kingdom. Full project was done in 4,5 months and well within budget. Project team consisted of 10 people and 3 external companies.

contributors.headline: Data  Driven Digital Marketing Director *Brand Builder *Marketing Strategist *Digital Innovation *Drive Business By Innovation

projects.title: Global Scorecard Development
projects.description: Development and implementation of a Social Media global scorecard to be used in all countries and regions and by both Valvoline affiliates and Valvoline distributors. The scorecard allows to measure results in reach, interactivity, media value etc in a unified method and on a global scale for a multitude of Social Media channels.

projects.title: Pan-European introduction of social media strategy

Valvoline Europe has quickly evolved into the biggest and most active Valvoline fan page global and  has beaten competition pages in interactivity. This project formed the step up to global social media strategy which I lead.

contributors.headline: Data  Driven Digital Marketing Director *Brand Builder *Marketing Strategist *Digital Innovation *Drive Business By Innovation

projects.title: Roll out of new EMEA corporate website
projects.description: Full redesign and launch of the corporate website for Valvoline EMEA according to new strategy. Website was launched within budget and within 8 months.SEO results were boosted. Pageviews grew by 150%, unique visitors by 100%. 11 languages rolled out, secured business support area. Strategy and tactics were upscaled and used on new Global project which I co-lead. As result of this project I won the "Excellence in Execution Award".

profile_positions.description:
Building the digital foundation, the digital marketing strategies and platforms to increase brand awareness, generate leads/sales, increase customer intimacy and data independency. Responsible for taking the lead in transforming Lamb Weston into a digital/data and analytics driven company by building data touchpoints, providing insights from data that grows our commercial opportunities, customer satisfaction and product development. 

Tasks include:
•	Develop & manage the Digital Innovation & Marketing team
•	Set the overall strategy for digital marketing (i.e. SEM, social, performance, direct), including the areas of: Digital Marketing & Innovation, Digital Infrastructure, Marketing & Data and Digital Media, Training on digital awareness & maturity.
•	Lead the creation of digital marketing campaigns for channels/trade and Product Studio.
•	Set the roadmap for channels/trade and other departments on the usage/development of digital.
•	Develop a digital/data first mindset in the Lamb Weston organization.
•	Anticipate current/future digital opportunities and test/implement accordingly.
•	Ensure rules/laws/regulations are followed.
•	Set the digital innovation pipeline & agenda.
•	Lead Business Product Owner of all commercial digital platforms (website(s), apps, portals etc.).
•	Lead the strategy development of our CRM/marketing automation capabilities and interconnectivity between systems.
•	Lead the commercial data intelligence strategy.
•	Lead the creation of Customer Data DNA profiles and data algorithms optimizing sales cycles and sales results
•	Set the EMEA digital advertising budget
•	Build and manage an international team of agencies that centrally buy all media and locally execute
profile_positions.title: Director Digital Innovation & Marketing EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Eat This! magazine is a foodservice magazine made by foodservice professionals for foodservice professionals, providing valuable insights in trends, recipes, business models and everything that makes your foodservice business thrive.
At Eat This! we believe that partnership is what makes the world go round and that is why the magazine is build on partnership working together with foodservice experts in any field that is required to give you the best insights and inspiration to always be one step ahead of the competition.
profile_positions.title: Chief Editor Eat This! Magazine

profile_positions.description:
Lead the "Digital Innovation & Brand Marketing Department". Principle Product Owner of our commercial digital platforms and visonair on the development of (future) digital marketing platforms and channels. Research, test and experiment new technology and channels to optimize our brand communication, marketing mix and customer insights database.

Tasks include:
•	Lead & inspire a multinational team of internal and external experts
•	Lead the development of all digital marketing channels and platforms (internal and external)
•	Lead the long term digital marketing innovation strategy, its platforms, as well as involved in tooling and processes to increase brand reputation, loyalty (indirect) revenue
•	Lead the development of the company’s digital marketing vision, strategy, and roadmap and drive execution. Integrate front of house digital relevance and presence with back of house processes, tooling and interconnectivities
•	Lead brand comm. and digital innovation opportunities based on customer needs
•	Product Owner of all digital commercial developments
•	Lead the Lamb Weston (B2B/B2C) brand strategy 
•	Lead multi-country brand communication campaigns in EMEA
•	Lead the customer database strategy in Marketing Automation growing our user base
•	Lead the creation of compliance documents for Digital Marketing, privacy and innovation

profile_positions.title: Online/Digital Marketing Manager EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all Online/Digital Marketing Channels

Leading subjects:
✺ Strategy definition & implementation
✺ Customer contact & campaign strategy
✺ Online Marketing budget responsibility
✺ Legal and regulatory around digital initiatives, GDPR
✺ Research of innovative oppertunities & monitor trends
✺ SEM / E-mail marketing / Social / Mobile / CRM
✺ Analytics
✺ Training of employees (Social Selling / Content Marketing)
✺ Lead direct sales E-commerce team (2FTE)

About Veenman BV:
Veenman BV is an independent partner who helps organisations with managing and optimizing their information- and documentmanagement processes. As an IDM (Integrated Document Management) specialist Veenman structures, optimizes and digitizes the stream of documents both on premise as within the cloud. Veenman is specialized in the branches of healthcare, education, notaryship, transport and logistics. The Veenman Smart Office (headquarters) is situated in Rotterdam and has regional offices in Amsterdam, Best and Zwolle. Veenman is a full daugther company of the Xerox Corporation. 

Key results:
- Development and implementation digital marketing strategy
- Development and implementation of campaign management
- Content Marketing Strategy connecting on-/offline
- Introduced training and actively trained sales on Social Selling principles
- New full responsive corporate website + new blogging website (110% visitor increase)
- 150% increase of exposure via social media (+40k free publicity value)
- Setup of E-mail marketing with >25% Open- en CT rate
- Online lead building MQL and SQL
 
http://www.veenman.nl
